entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
